title: Born For More â€” Story & Process
quote: We recorded the hook at 2am with the city humming outside.
body:
This track started as a voice memo...

Verse guitars were DI with a gentle chorus...

sections.title: Writing
sections.body: I wanted the lyric to feel inevitable rather than triumphant...

sections.title: Production
sections.body: Warm synth bed, mono bass to anchor, widening only on the drops...

body: Kick off was a late-night loop. Chorus widens at 1:12...
